snippet: Speaking in English and using PowerPoint, the Iranian foreign minister outlined a proposal to the big powers aimed at ending the nuclear dispute.
abstract: Iranian Foreign Min Mohammad Javad Zarif outlines proposal to representatives of big powers that would constrain his country's nuclear program in return for a right to enrich uranium and an easing of the sanctions that have been battering the Iranian economy.

byline.original: By MICHAEL R. GORDON and THOMAS ERDBRINK
byline.contributor: Michael R. Gordon reported from Geneva, and Thomas Erdbrink from Tehran. Isabel Kershner contributed reporting from Jerusalem.

lead_paragraph: Speaking in English and using PowerPoint, the Iranian foreign minister outlined a proposal to the big powers aimed at ending the nuclear dispute.

headline.main: Iran Presents Nuclear Plan to Big Powers
headline.print_headline: Iran Presents Nuclear Plan To Big Powers
